catalog_script_client.name: subcategory value onChange script

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_be98860d471675101c89dffe046d4338
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Create Financial Request">d36f6dc9479275101c89dffe046d4311</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:49c9758947d275101c89dffe046d43d0</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>subcategory value onChange script</name><order/><published_ref/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
    if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
        return;
    }

    g_form.clearOptions('subcategory');

    if (g_form.getValue('category') == 'bills') {
        g_form.addOption('subcategory', 'creation', 'Creation');
        g_form.addOption('subcategory', 'cancellation', 'Cancellation');
        g_form.addOption('subcategory', 'payment', 'Payment');
    } else {
        g_form.addOption('subcategory', 'internal', 'Internal');
        g_form.addOption('subcategory', 'external', 'External');

    }

}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-11-02 17:09:15</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>be98860d471675101c89dffe046d4338</sys_id><sys_mod_count>17</sys_mod_count><sys_name>subcategory value onChange script</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Finance Service Management" source="x_1106871_financ_0">aba95e8c471e31101c89dffe046d437d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Finance Service Management">aba95e8c471e31101c89dffe046d437d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_be98860d471675101c89dffe046d4338</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-11-03 09:53:55</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
